description.ko: 완벽한 기하학이 디지털 파편의 리드미컬한 춤으로 녹아드는 단색의 혼돈에 대한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A study in monochromatic chaos, where perfect geometry dissolves into a rhythmic dance of digital fragments.

prompt: An infinite architectural landscape of obsidian monoliths fracturing into a cascade of vertical digital scanlines and sharp geometric debris against a stark white void. The composition features a complex balance of monochrome order and chaotic glitch aesthetics. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on the polished black glass surfaces. High-contrast cinematic lighting creates razor-sharp shadows, emphasizing the deep textures of digital noise and the fragmented complexity of the collapsing geometric order.
